SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, A.* FROM ( SELECT s.cp_code, s.cp_name, s.cp_type, s.cp_value, s.cp_min_price, s.cp_issue_date, s.cp_exp_date, s.cp_stat, COUNT(u.cp_no) AS issueCount, SUM(CASE WHEN u.cp_stat = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS usedCount FROM SYS_COUPON s LEFT JOIN USER_COUPON u ON s.cp_code = u.cp_code
AND s.cp_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND s.cp_code LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND s.cp_type LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
GROUP BY s.cp_code, s.cp_name, s.cp_type, s.cp_value, s.cp_min_price, s.cp_issue_date, s.cp_exp_date, s.cp_stat ORDER BY s.cp_code ASC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pg} * #{size}) ) WHERE rn > ((#{pg}-1) * #{size})

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYS_COUPON s
AND s.cp_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND s.cp_code LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND s.cp_type LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
